metadata.title: Stavros Perakis | Pottery Sculptor in Athens
metadata.description: Stavros Perakis is a pottery sculptor based in Athens. Explore his stunning work and get in touch for commissions or purchases.
metadata.descriptionCollection: A collection of pottery and sculptures, handmade by Stavros Perakis

metadata.descriptionWorkshops: Book a spot in our workshops with Stavros Perakis and immerse yourself in the art of the wheel
